entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Label control's text attribute does not handle non-english alphabet characters, and it throws XamlCTask error #4412
  • MAUI Projects do not show platform specific .cs C# code files except for the first TFM in the TargetFrameworks list #4410
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Ensure XAML / C# Hot Reload, Live Visual Tree code is removed from release builds #4409
  • [Enhancement] Add appsettings support #4408
    .NET 7
  • NavigationPage.HasBackButton property not working in Windows 11 #4407
  • Cannot change Android SDK version from 31 to a lower one. #4404

Closed

  • App crashes in Release configuration #4358
    6.0.200-preview.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the ignored .cs files to None #4411
    6.0.200-preview.13

Merged

  • Remove legacy TFMs #4403
  • [WinUI] Fix Alignment and Header Visibility #4400
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Correctly register DependencyService entries #4385
    area/hosting 🧩, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4395
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [X] add error diagnostics to XamlG sourceGen #4376
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Move Xaml.VisualDiagnostics to Maui.Core #4333
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • CarouselView android handler #3343
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls [iOS] #3141
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1760 #2763
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • Workload targets improvements (#1611) 2.0 #2011
    area/setup 🪄
